main event: An investigation into the sighting of three unidentified airborne objects at Toledo, Ohio on 9 April 1949.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing three silver, round saucer-like objects,The objects were observed around 11:30 AM,Traveling at an estimated speed of 40-45 MPH, The investigation aimed to obtain detailed signed statements from witnesses,Certain details of the report were redacted due to sensitivity.
witness description: Unique details referenced in witness statements were redacted, and one witness could not be located during the investigation.
